mapper.select: SELECT a.* ,b.name as categoryName,c.name as username from info a inner join type_value b on a.typeId = b.id inner join users c on a.userId = c.id where a.id = #{id}
SELECT a.* ,b.name as categoryName,c.name as username from info a inner join type_value b on a.typeId = b.id inner join users c on a.userId = c.id where a.userId = #{userId} and a.typeId = #{typeId}
mapper.update: update info set content = #{content}, title = #{title}, updateTime = getDate() where id = #{id}
